sentences.en: As a result, emergency preparedness and response planning - to - business events is critical.
sentences.cn: 因此, 规划对企业应对突发事件至关重要.

sentences.en: Everything was in a state of preparedness.
Guide: This was the army's tunnel for war preparedness.
sentences.cn: 导游: 这是陆军的战备坑道.

sentences.en: I was surprised by his preparedness to break the law.
sentences.cn: 我对他打算以身试法感到惊讶。

sentences.en: It provides emergency preparedness training around the world.
sentences.cn: 它在全世界范围内提供紧急事件应对的培训.

sentences.en: It's called the Pan-Carib-bean Disaster Preparedness and Prevention Project, which is quite a mouthful.
sentences.cn: 它被称为thePan-CaribbeanDisasterPreparednessandPreventionProject（泛加勒比备灾防灾项目），名称相当冗长拗口。

sentences.en: Preparedness ensures security ; unpreparedness invites disaster .
sentences.cn: 有备才能无患,无备必定 吃亏.

sentences.en: Preparedness ensures success, unpreparedness spells failure.
sentences.cn: 凡事预则立, 不预则废.

sentences.en: The best guarantee of peace is preparedness for war.
sentences.cn: 和平的最佳保证是备战.

sentences.en: The commission also discusses the preparedness of the EU for further expansion.
sentences.cn: 欧盟委员会同时讨论欧盟为将来扩充成员所做的准备.

sentences.en: the country’s lack of military preparedness
sentences.cn: 该国在军事上的准备不足

sentences.en: This base area enjoyed ready preparedness , an important military strategic position and a solid mass foundation.
sentences.cn: 晋察冀地区历史悠久, 战略地位非常重要,有良好的群众基础.

sentences.en: This paper analyzed the typical oil pollution accidents and proposed recommendations on oil pollution preparedness.
sentences.cn: 文中就典型事故作了分析,提出了对船舶油污防备的建议.

sentences.en: This phenomenon has been called preparedness.
We are determined to strengthen our preparedness against war.

words.tran_cn: 使准备好；使（病人）准备接受手术

trans.tran_en: when someone is ready for something
